QuestData.Title: The Dark Lady's Gift
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: New to the rank of Blademaster, Na'Shra is a formidable warrior and master of arms.
QuestData.RewardText:
I was bidden to find my way to you, and to swear my service. Whatever you need of me, I will offer. I take a particular pleasure in turning things to ashes.
The dark lady sends her regards.
